#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
inline int scan() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  int ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	t=scan();
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int o,e;
		e=scan();o=scan();
		if((o+e)%5!=0){printf("-1\n");
		}
		else
		{
			long long int ans=abs((2*(o+e))/5-e);
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
	}
}
